name: proposed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 suggested as a possible plan or action for people to consider: There have been huge demonstrations against the proposed factory closure.
intended or planned: The money will be used to fund the company’s proposed acquisitions. Related word
propose
More examplesFewer examplesThey called a demonstration to protest against proposed job cuts.The proposed new exam system has been vigorously opposed by teachers.There is a lot of opposition to the proposed changes.The proposed reforms include making secondary education compulsory up to the age of 18.The survey found a wide spread of opinion over the proposed new building.
